project.name: SYMPHONY Platform
project.description: A creative partnership environment where human developers and specialized AI agents collaborate harmoniously to bring software concepts to life.
philosophy: Creative Partnership Over Tool Usage: The platform enables co-creation rather than mere task automation.
Natural Language as Primary Interface: SpecLang serves as the bridge between human intent and machine execution.
Advancing Pattern Architecture: Systems are designed to naturally progress toward desired outcomes.
Narrative-Driven Development: Code stories and ledgers preserve the creative consciousness and history of the project.

features.name: SpecLang Engine
features.description: Enables users to create natural language specifications that bridge human intent and machine execution.

features.name: Agent Orchestra
features.description: Allows users to create specialized AI partnerships for different development phases, leveraging a diverse roster of agents.

features.name: Creative Archaeology Service
features.description: Empowers users to create deep understanding from existing codebases through the RISE methodology.

features.name: Tension Resolution Engine
features.description: Facilitates the natural progression from the current reality of a project to its desired future state via structured planning.

features.name: Creative Validation Engine
features.description: Provides feedback on the structure, logic, and clarity of code or text to ensure quality.

features.name: UI/Experience Layer Tools
features.description: A suite of tools for UI ideation, visual creation, and conceptual mapping.

features.name: Ledger System (Project Memory)
features.description: Archives key decisions, milestones, and session snapshots to preserve project history.

features.name: GitHub Integration Service
features.description: Provides a UI for committing changes and creating pull requests.

workflows.name: Core Creative Workflow
workflows.description: The primary user journey from conceptualization to planning, implementation, and completion.
steps: User improvises an idea in the Workspace.
Mia composes a SpecLang document and arranges a Development Plan.
Aetherial performs the implementation based on the plan.
User completes the movement and returns to Mia's plan to continue the symphony.

roadmapSummary: Deeper Git Integration (real commits/PRs as narrative acts)
Formalizing a Plugin/Extension API for new agents to join the orchestra
Creating a machine-readable Ledger System for agent learning
